method.name: get_aabb
method.description: Returns the [AABB] (also known as the bounding box) for this VisualInstance.

method.name: get_transformed_aabb
method.description: Returns the transformed [AABB] (also known as the bounding box) for this VisualInstance. Transformed in this case means the [AABB] plus the position, rotation, and scale of the [Spatial]s [Transform]

method.name: set_base
method.description: Sets the base of the VisualInstance, which changes how the engine handles the VisualInstance under the hood. It is recommended to only use [method set_base] if you know what you're doing.

members.member: The render layer(s) this VisualInstance is drawn on. This object will only be visible for [Camera]s whose cull mask includes the render object this VisualInstance is set to.
